summary: Defines a comprehensive set of custom exception classes that represent the various error conditions encountered by the Certbot client, covering configuration issues, storage failures, plugin problems, account handling, locking, subprocess execution, signal interruptions, and other operational errors.
business_intent: Enable precise error detection and handling throughout the Certbot application, allowing developers and the program itself to differentiate between distinct failure scenarios, provide informative feedback to users, and maintain robust operation during certificate management tasks.
